import { Playground } from "docz";
import { Box, Label, Input, Button, Select } from "theme-ui";
Here is were we define all the form components and their style

<Playground>

      alert("You clicked me");
    }}

<Playground>

    variant="secondary"
    onClick={() => {
      alert("You clicked me");
    }}
  >
    Click me

</Playground>
